questions.title: Tags
questions.body: Hello, i composed my new question and then submit button not submitted the question. After some time i discovered it is because i need to hit enter after each tag, i separated by comma as it is common on most of the forums. It can be good if the form tell me why it do not submit, or allow submitting the form without tags if i not hit enter or not write anything in tags.

questions.title: Edit own question?
questions.body: I can not edit my own question here, should i make a typo or need to update it?
